trans-unit.source: Real-time event processing with Stream Analytics | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Real-time event processing with Stream Analytics | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how a set of Azure services can interoperate for enabling real-time event processing and analytics.
trans-unit.target: Learn how a set of Azure services can interoperate for enabling real-time event processing and analytics.

trans-unit.source: Reference Architecture: Real-time event processing with Microsoft Azure Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Reference Architecture: Real-time event processing with Microsoft Azure Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: The reference architecture for real-time event processing with Azure Stream Analytics is intended to provide a generic blueprint for deploying a real-time platform as a service (PaaS) stream-processing solution with Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: The reference architecture for real-time event processing with Azure Stream Analytics is intended to provide a generic blueprint for deploying a real-time platform as a service (PaaS) stream-processing solution with Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Summary
trans-unit.target: Summary

trans-unit.source: Traditionally, analytics solutions have been based on capabilities such as ETL (extract, transform, load) and data warehousing, where data is stored prior to analysis.
trans-unit.target: Traditionally, analytics solutions have been based on capabilities such as ETL (extract, transform, load) and data warehousing, where data is stored prior to analysis.

trans-unit.source: Changing requirements, including more rapidly arriving data, are pushing this existing model to the limit.
trans-unit.target: Changing requirements, including more rapidly arriving data, are pushing this existing model to the limit.

trans-unit.source: The ability to analyze data within moving streams prior to storage is one solution, and while it is not a new capability, the approach has not been widely adopted across all industry verticals.
trans-unit.target: The ability to analyze data within moving streams prior to storage is one solution, and while it is not a new capability, the approach has not been widely adopted across all industry verticals.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure provides an extensive catalog of analytics technologies that are capable of supporting an array of different solution scenarios and requirements.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure provides an extensive catalog of analytics technologies that are capable of supporting an array of different solution scenarios and requirements.

trans-unit.source: Selecting which Azure services to deploy for an end-to-end solution can be a challenge given the breadth of offerings.
trans-unit.target: Selecting which Azure services to deploy for an end-to-end solution can be a challenge given the breadth of offerings.

trans-unit.source: This paper is designed to describe the capabilities and interoperation of the various Azure services that support an event-streaming solution.
trans-unit.target: This paper is designed to describe the capabilities and interoperation of the various Azure services that support an event-streaming solution.

trans-unit.source: It also explains some of the scenarios in which customers can benefit from this type of approach.
trans-unit.target: It also explains some of the scenarios in which customers can benefit from this type of approach.
